name: Protect the Flame (Complete Edition)
description:
Protect the Flame is a 2 player game where you team up to protect your campfire from waves of enemies and keep it up as long as you can.

This is a continuation of the game we made for Game Dev London Winter Jam - 2020. Hope you enjoy it :D

Controls:-

Player 1 (Collector):

- WASD: Movement

- Space: Carry and Place Wood

Player 2 (Fighter):

- Arrow Keys: Movement

- Mouse: Aim and Attack

- Right Ctrl: Pickup Weapons

Credits: 

Coding and Gameplay Design

Music and SFX
